full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Truck, Dumps/Dump Spreader, Heavy Configuration

## Request for Supply Arrangement

### Tender Notice Reference

* Tender Notice: PW-22-01006374 (Third Amendment)
* Solicitation Number: W8476-236634/A
* Publication Date: September 7, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: October 24, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: October 4, 2022

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of 11 truck, dumps/dump spreaders, heavy configurations, being delivered to Wainwright, Gagetown, and Petawawa and related items. This requisition is subject to Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-16TRUK.

### Fundamental Information

* The solicitation process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HP-16TRUK. Suppliers interested in becoming a pre-qualified supplier under this RFSA shall refer to the following resources: [Buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-539-73419](http://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-539-73419).
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* There is no security requirement associated with this requirement.

### Completion Milestones

* The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is 120 days after contractual execution.

### Contact Information

* For information, please contact the contracting authority regarding this Request for Supply Arrangement: Genevieve Roach
* Email: genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca
* Note that contact information is located at National Defence Headquarters, 101 Colonel By Dr, Director Land Procurement (DLP) 5-3-4-6, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada.

You may see only the most essential information, detailed explanations, and technical justifications in this adapted release. This announcement was published on September 7, 2022, and changes on October 4, 2022. Be sure to ensure clarity, intensity, and correctness of the following details. We anticipate your feedback!
